Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculateUserRewardsAndFees(uint256)":{"params":{"rewardAmountIncludingFees":"Total reward amount including fees"},"returns":{"fees":"Amount of fees to be quadrillion","rewardToken_":"Address of token used for rewards","startTimestamp_":"When the campaign becomes active (0 for immediate)","targetToken_":"Address of token users need to hold"}},"getBalanceOfSelf(address)":{"params":{"token":"Address of token to check"},"returns":{"_0":"Balance of the token"}},"getCampaignInfo()":{"returns":{"_claimableRewards":"Amount of rewards active","_pendingRewards":"Total rewards pending claim","_rewardPPQ":"Reward parameter in parts per quadrillion","_rewardToken":"Address of token used for rewards","_startTimestamp":"When the campaign becomes active","_targetToken":"Address of token users need to hold","_totalReallocatedAmount":"Total amount of tokens reallocated"}},"getRewardAmountIncludingFees(uint256)":{"params":{"toAmount":"Amount of target tokens to calculate rewards for"},"returns":{"_0":"Total reward amount including platform fees, scaled to reward token decimals"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"handleReallocation(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Only callable by SWAP_CALLER_ROLE, handles both ERC20 and native tokens","params":{"campaignId_":"ID of the campaign","data":"Additional data for the reallocation","toAmount":"Expected amount of tokens to be acquired","toToken":"Address of the token being acquired","userAddress":"Address of the participating user"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"invalidateParticipations(uint256[])":{"details":"Only callable by operator role","params":{"pIDs":"Array of participation IDs to invalidate"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"rescueTokens(address)":{"details":"Only callable by NUDGE_ADMIN_ROLE, can't rescue the reward token","params":{"token":"Address of token to rescue"},"returns":{"amount":"Amount of tokens rescued"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setIsCampaignActive(bool)":{"details":"Only callable by Nudge admins","params":{"isActive":"New active status"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See withdraw"}}},"title":"NudgeCampaign","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"calculateUserRewardsAndFees(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates user rewards and fees from total reward balance of the specified token for this contract"},"getCampaignInfo()":{"notice":"Returns comprehensive information about the campaign"},"getRewardAmountIncludingFees(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates returns.fees: Amount of fees to be collected
returns.userRewards: Amount of rewards for the user

claimRewards(uint256[]).details: Verifies holding period, caller and participation status, and handles reward distribution

params.pIDs: Array of participation IDs to claim rewards for

collectFees().details: Only callable by NudgeCampaignFactory or Nudge admins

params.alternativeWithdrawalAddress_: Optional alternative address for withdrawing unallocated rewards (zero address to re-use `campaignAdmin`)
params.feeBps_: Nudge's fee percentage in basis points
params.rewardPPQ_: Amount of reward tokens earned for participating in the campaign, in parts per quadrillion
params.rewardToken_: Address of token used for rewards
params.startTimestamp_: When the campaign becomes active (0 for immediate)
params.targetToken_: Address of token users need to hold

returns._claimableRewards: Amount of rewards available for distribution
returns._isCampaignActive: Whether the campaign is currently active
returns._rewardPPQ: Reward parameter in parts per quadrillion
returns._rewardToken: Address of token used for rewards
returns._targetToken: Address of token users need to hold

params.toAmount: Amount of target tokens to calculate rewards for

returns._0: Total reward amount including platform fees, scaled to reward token decimals

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

handleReallocation(uint256,address,addre.details: Only callable by SWAP_CALLER_ROLE, handles both ERC20 and native tokens

params.toAmount: Expected amount of tokens to be acquired
params.toToken: Address of the token being acquired

params.pIDs: Array of participation IDs to invalidate

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

rescueTokens(address).details: Only callable by NUDGE_ADMIN_ROLE, can't rescue the reward token

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

calculateUserRewardsAndFees(uint256).notice: Calculates user rewards and fees from total reward amount

claimableRewardAmount().notice: Calculates the amount of rewards available for distribution

constructor.notice: Creates a new campaign with specified parameters

getBalanceOfSelf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified token for this contract

getCampaignInfo().notice: Returns comprehensive information about the campaign

getRewardAmountIncludingFees(uint256).notice: Calculates the total reward amount (including platform fees) based on target token amount

handleReallocation(uint256,address,addre.notice: Handles token reallocation for campaign participation

rescueTokens(address).notice: Rescues tokens that were mistakenly sent to the contract

setIsCampaignActive(bool).notice: Marks a campaign as active, i.e accepting new participations

withdrawRewards(uint256).notice: Withdraws unallocated rewards from the campaign

documentation.text: @notice Ensures the campaign is not paused
@notice Restricts access to factory contract or Nudge admins
@notice Restricts access to Nudge operators
@notice Checks if campaign is active or can be activated based on current timestamp

@notice Calculates the amount of rewards available for distribution
 @return Amount of claimable rewards
@notice Allows contract to receive native token transfers
@notice Fallback function to receive native token transfers

@title NudgeCampaign
 @notice A contract for managing Nudge campaigns with token rewards
